decks.notes: This deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, utilizing cards that can quickly fill the graveyard and bring back Arclight Phoenix multiple times. The deck includes powerful draw spells like Treasure Cruise and Consider to dig for key pieces, as well as removal spells like Lightning Axe and Fiery Impulse to clear the way for attacks. With a mix of spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan and card advantage engines to keep the pressure on, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells and quick creatures.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures to trigger powerful effects such as Mayhem Devil and Bloodtithe Harvester. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven and Deadly Dispute, the deck aims to maintain a board presence while disrupting the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Ygra, Eater of All allows for additional ways to generate value and pressure the opponent. The deck also includes some removal spells like Fatal Push and Scavenger's Talent to deal with threats and keep the opponent on the defensive.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, utilizing powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger to pressure the opponent. It also includes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to clear the way for your creatures. Thoughtseize and Duress help disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Fear of Missing Out provides additional reach. The deck's mana base is optimized for consistency and allows for various lines of play. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently.

This UW Control deck focuses on controlling the game by countering and removing opponent's threats, while generating card advantage and card selection to out-value the opponent. The deck utilizes a mix of counterspells, removal spells, card draw, and powerful finishers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Marang River Regent. The companion Lutri, the Spellchaser provides additional flexibility and value. The deck aims to control the game and eventually overwhelm the opponent with its powerful spells and card advantage.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with spells and using them to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard to deal massive damage to the opponent. It utilizes card draw and selection spells to find key pieces, as well as removal spells to control the board. The inclusion of Picklock Prankster and Artist's Talent helps generate additional value and potentially create explosive turns. The deck aims to be aggressive and fast-paced, overwhelming the opponent with a steady stream of threats while disrupting their game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing Enigmatic Incarnation to tutor and play powerful creatures with varying converted mana costs, while controlling the board with Leyline Binding, Spara's Headquarters, and other spells. The deck also includes a variety of Triomes for mana fixing and consistency, along with powerful creatures like Atraxa and Zur to gain advantage over the opponent. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent by continually upgrading its creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan with its control elements.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly through cards like Arboreal Grazer and Crumbling Vestige, in order to play Lotus Field and generate large amounts of mana. By using cards like Scapeshift and Lumra, Bellow of the Woods, the deck aims to combo off and win the game in one explosive turn. The deck also includes ways to search for key combo pieces such as Wishclaw Talisman. The strategy is to manipulate lands and resources efficiently to set up a winning board state, often involving a game-winning Thassa's Oracle.

The main focus of this Red Deck Wins aggro archetype is to quickly put pressure on the opponent with low-cost creatures and burn spells. The deck is designed to deal damage efficiently and swiftly, utilizing cards like Monstrous Rage, Burst Lightning, and Kumano Faces Kakkazan. It also includes robust creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Robber of the Rich to maintain board presence and apply constant pressure. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Greasefang Parhelion combo to generate value and overwhelm opponents. By combining the abilities of Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II, the deck aims to create a powerful board presence and outpace opponents. Thoughtseize and Seasoned Hallowblade provide disruption and protection, while Monument to Endurance and Sheltered by Ghosts offer additional support and sustainability. With a mixture of control elements and aggressive tactics, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory through its strong synergies and powerful combos.

This deck focuses on disrupting opponents with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and disrupting their graveyard with cards like Cling to Dust. The deck also features aggressive creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Graveyard Trespasser to quickly close out the game. Liliana of the Veil provides additional disruption and removal. The deck also includes control elements like Go for the Throat and Fatal Push to deal with opposing threats. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using counterspells, board wipes, and card draw to outvalue the opponent. The addition of Kaheera as a companion provides additional utility and synergy with the deck's creatures. The deck also includes various land cards to ensure consistent mana production and spell casting. Overall, the deck aims to establish control early on and maintain it throughout the game, eventually overwhelming the opponent with powerful spells and card advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using low-cost creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Heartfire Hero, as well as burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike. The deck also includes cards like Monstrous Rage and Reckless Rage to pump up creatures and deal extra damage. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of threats and burn spells, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

This Mono Black Control deck focuses on utilizing disruption and removal spells such as Thoughtseize, Fatal Push, and Liliana of the Veil to control the opponent's resources and maintain board dominance. The deck also includes threats like Graveyard Trespasser and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to apply pressure and close out the game. The inclusion of cards like Castle Locthwain, Mutavault, and Unholy Annex / Ritual Chamber allow for card advantage and flexibility in play. Ultimately, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through a combination of control elements and powerful threats.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on using low-cost creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven and Cauldron Familiar for repeatable damage, along with cards like Fatal Push and Abrupt Decay for removal, the deck aims to maintain board presence and control. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Gilded Goose and Traverse the Ulvenwald for mana ramp and creature search, allowing for flexibility in responses to opponent's threats. With a mix of creature aggression and control elements, this deck aims to outpace and outlast opponents in a fast-paced format.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize Lotus Field's ability to generate massive amounts of mana, allowing you to quickly ramp up and cast powerful spells like Scapeshift to overwhelm your opponent with a flurry of land-based combos. The deck includes cards that help you search for key pieces, protect your combo pieces, and maximize the efficiency of your mana production. By carefully managing your resources and setting up your board state, you can achieve explosive turns and outpace your opponent in a Pioneer 1 vs 1 match.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly equipping creatures with powerful equipment like Colossus Hammer and Shadowspear to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Mox Amber and Kazuul's Toll Collector to accelerate mana production and allow for fast plays. With a mix of strong creatures and efficient equipping options, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive and explosive plays, ending the game quickly before the opponent has a chance to respond.
